abilities.rule: While this model is leading a unit, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the **[ASSAULT]** ability.

abilities.name: Flames of Change
abilities.rule: In your Shooting phase, after this model has shot, select one enemy unit (excluding **MONSTERS** and **VEHICLES**) hit by one or more of those attacks, and roll one D6. On a 4+, until the end of your opponentâ€™s next turn, that enemy unit is aflame. While a unit is aflame, subtract 2" from its Move characteristic and subtract 2 from Advance and Charge rolls made for it.
